name: In the Loop
description:
In the Loop (LUDUM DARE 47) is a minimalist physics based game in which your goal is to reach the last loop using the momentum created by the previous ones.

I hope you had fun with it :)

Note: there is an annoying noise in the audio only in the web build that unfortunately I was unable to remove. I hope it is not so inconvenient.

Controls

R = restart level

Space = 'jump'

Tools used:

Unity

Aseprite

JFXR - jfxr.frozenfractal.com
